contentList.content: You are an outcast among outcasts; your bloodline hails not from the Nine Hells, but from the Infinite Layers of the Abyss.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> maximum increases by 1 for each level. Additionally, all incoming damage is reduced by 1.
You can perceive your surroundings without relying on sight.
When you attack a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> target, you also <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CRIPPLED">Maim</LSTag> it for 1 turn.
Your very presence unnerves your enemies. Your claw attacks deal an additional [1].

Can't be used at the same time as <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Manifestation_of_Body">Manifestation of Body</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Manifestation_of_Mind">Manifestation of Mind</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Manifestation_of_Soul">Manifestation of Soul</LSTag>.
Lash out with deadly claws and make your enemy <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.
Lash out with deadly claws at your target and all surrounding enemies, making them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.
Stepping between planes, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
